events.message: I received the laptop yesterday but noticed a large scratch on the screen as soon as I unpacked it. This defect is really disappointing.
The issue was categorized under Product Defect due to the customer reporting damage to the screen of the laptop.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the case regarding the defected laptop screen reported just now.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the scratch on your laptop screen. I’m here to help you resolve this.
Could you please provide a photo of the scratched screen and confirm when you received the laptop? This will help us process your claim faster.
I have attached clear photos of the scratch. The package arrived this morning, and I only just unboxed it. The damage looks like it happened before shipping.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer to replace the laptop or issue a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will initiate the process immediately.
I would prefer a replacement rather than a refund. Please send the new laptop as soon as possible and provide a return label for the damaged one.
A replacement laptop order has been processed and a return shipping label emailed to you. You should receive the new laptop within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement laptop and that everything is working well. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case based on your confirmation of receiving the replacement and satisfaction with the solution provided. Thank you for your patience.
